price: Umuriro uzatwika uburanga bwabo (iminwa iveho), maze bawubemo bashinyitse.
arabic: تَلۡفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا كَٰلِحُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: talfaḥu wujūhahumu al-nāru wahum fīhā kāliḥūna
